hero.headline: We Build the
hero.subheadline: TKH TECH Inc. is your on-demand software group. Tell us your idea — we scope, design, and ship production-ready SaaS products tailored exactly to your business needs.

about.subtitle: About TKH TECH Inc.
about.heading: Your On-Demand Software Group
about.description: We are a specialized software group that builds tailored SaaS products based on exactly what clients need — nothing more, nothing less.
about.missionTitle: We don't sell software. We build yours.
about.missionP1: TKH TECH Inc. is a Montreal-based software group with a singular mission: to help businesses bring their software ideas to life. We specialize in building custom SaaS applications on demand, designed around each client's unique workflow, industry, and growth goals.
about.missionP2: Our approach is straightforward — you come to us with a problem or an idea, we scope it, design it, and deliver a production-grade product. No cookie-cutter solutions. No unnecessary complexity. Just focused, high-quality software that works exactly the way your business needs it to.

demandDriven.title: Demand-Driven
demandDriven.description: We only build what you actually need — no bloat, no one-size-fits-all templates.

fastExecution.title: Fast Execution
fastExecution.description: From scoping call to production-ready MVP, we move with speed and precision.

productionQuality.title: Production Quality
productionQuality.description: Every product we ship is built to scale — secure, tested, and maintainable.

clientPartnership.title: Client Partnership
clientPartnership.description: You're involved at every step. We build with you, not just for you.

principles: We translate complex business requirements into elegant software solutions
Every product is custom-architected for your specific use case and growth trajectory
We leverage cloud-native infrastructure so your SaaS scales from day one
Transparent communication and iterative delivery keep you in control throughout

howItWorks.subtitle: The Process
howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: From your initial idea to a live product — here's how we work together to build your SaaS.

step1.title: Submit Your Idea
step1.description: Tell us about your project using our request form. Describe the problem you're solving, your target users, and any specific requirements. No technical jargon needed — just your vision.
details: Fill out the project request form
Share your timeline and budget range

step2.title: We Scope & Design
step2.description: Our team analyzes your requirements and schedules a discovery call. We define the product scope, create wireframes, architect the technical solution, and provide a clear project proposal.

step3.title: We Build & Deliver
step3.description: We develop your product in iterative sprints with regular demos and feedback sessions. You stay informed throughout. At the end, we hand off a fully tested, production-ready SaaS product.

howItWorks.ctaDescription: The first step is simple — tell us about your project. We'll take it from there.

services.subtitle: What We Do
services.heading: Services Built Around Your Needs
services.description: From idea to production — we offer every service you need to build, launch, and grow your SaaS product.

customSaaS.title: Custom SaaS Development
customSaaS.description: We architect and build fully custom SaaS applications from the ground up. Every line of code is written for your specific use case — no templates, no shortcuts. We handle full-stack development: backend APIs, databases, cloud infrastructure, and web or mobile frontends.

mvp.title: MVP Prototyping
mvp.description: Got an idea but need to validate it fast? We build focused MVPs that get you to market quickly. We strip down to the essential features, ship a working product, and help you gather real user feedback before you invest in the full build.

productDesign.title: Product Design
productDesign.description: Great software starts with great design. Our design process covers user research, wireframing, UI design, and interactive prototyping. We create interfaces that users love — intuitive, accessible, and aligned with your brand.

support.title: Ongoing Support & Maintenance
support.description: Shipping is just the beginning. We provide ongoing support, bug fixes, performance monitoring, and feature development as your product evolves. Think of us as your long-term engineering partner.

portfolio.subtitle: Our Work
portfolio.heading: Products We've Shipped
portfolio.description: Four production SaaS products built on-demand for real business needs — each one a complete, scalable, and user-tested solution.

liveit.title: LiveIt — Event Management App
liveit.description: A native mobile app that lets users discover, create, and manage local events in real time. LiveIt connects event organizers with attendees, offering ticketing, RSVP management, push notifications, and live event updates — all in a sleek, consumer-grade experience.

medconnect.title: MedConnect — Telemedicine Platform
medconnect.description: A HIPAA-compliant telemedicine SaaS connecting patients with healthcare providers through secure video consultations, electronic prescriptions, and medical record management. Built to serve clinics and independent practitioners with a complete digital health workflow.

educore.title: EduCore — School Management SaaS
educore.description: A comprehensive school administration platform covering student enrollment, attendance tracking, grade management, parent communication, and fee collection. EduCore is built to streamline operations for schools of all sizes, from small private institutions to large networks.

securepay.title: SecurePay — C2C Payment Security App
securepay.description: A secure consumer-to-consumer payment platform that adds a trust and verification layer to peer-to-peer transactions. SecurePay uses escrow logic, identity verification, and fraud detection algorithms to protect both buyers and sellers in marketplace transactions.

portfolio.ctaText: Ready to add your product to this list?

requestProject.subtitle: Get Started
requestProject.heading: Request a Project
requestProject.description: Tell us about your idea. We'll review your submission and get back to you within 24 hours to schedule a discovery call.

form.placeholderDescription: Describe the problem you're solving, the features you need, who the users are, and any technical requirements or preferences...
form.requiredNote: * Required fields. We'll review and respond within 24 hours.

validation.descriptionMinLength: Description should be at least 20 characters

status.success: Your project request has been submitted! We'll be in touch within 24 hours.
status.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.
status.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.

contact.subtitle: Contact
contact.heading: Have a Question?
contact.description: Have a question? We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.

projectCta.title: Want to start a project?
projectCta.description: For project requests, use our dedicated form with detailed fields to help us understand your needs better.

status.success: Message sent! We'll get back to you within 24 hours.
status.error: Something went wrong. Please try again or contact us directly.
status.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.

footer.ctaDescription: Submit your project idea and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
footer.tagline: Your on-demand software group. We build the SaaS you need — custom, fast, and production-ready.
footer.followDescription: Stay connected with TKH TECH for the latest in SaaS development and tech innovation.

meta.title: TKH TECH Inc. - Innovative Software Development Solutions
meta.description: TKH TECH Inc. delivers cutting-edge software development services, from web applications to mobile apps and enterprise solutions. Transform your ideas into powerful digital experiences.
meta.keywords: software development, web development, mobile apps, enterprise software, cloud solutions, API development, React, Node.js, Python, TKH TECH
